p: The HDI has a significantly narrower scope than the capabilities listed by Nussbaum, but is more consistent with the capability approach as discussed by Sen. Recall that Sen discussed the capability approach as providing opportunities substantial to achieve freedom (1999). Energy consumption per capita relates to infant mortality, female life expectancy, and political freedom, in addition to HDI (Smil, 2008: 347), which all affects agents’ capabilities. While the relation between energy use and HDI most likely requires taking other components into consideration, for the sake of simplicity we will limit the discussion to energy use as a prerequisite for capabilities.
